content.thinking:
Let me analyze the two images provided:

1. Main Target Image (top image):
This shows a structure made of red and yellow building blocks. The structure appears to be symmetrical and looks like an "H" shape. It consists of:
- Red blocks with arches/semicircular cutouts
- Yellow rectangular blocks that connect the red blocks

2. Block Dictionary Image (bottom image):
This shows 14 different building blocks with their indices:
- Blocks 1-8 are red blocks with various cutouts and orientations
- Blocks 9-14 are yellow rectangular blocks in different orientations

Now I'll analyze the target structure in more detail:

The structure has 3 visible layers:
1. Bottom layer: Red blocks with arch cutouts
2. Middle layer: Yellow horizontal connecting blocks
3. Top layer: Red blocks with arch cutouts

Looking at the specific blocks in the target structure:
- The bottom layer has 4 red blocks with arches (2 on each side of the H)
- The middle layer has yellow connecting bars
- The top layer has 4 red blocks with arches (2 on each side of the H)

Let me identify exactly which blocks from the dictionary are used:

For the red blocks:
- Blocks 1 & 2 appear to be used for the top portions
- Blocks 1 & 2 also appear to be repeated for the bottom portions
(Note: Blocks 1 & 2 look like the same block but mirrored/from different angles)

For the yellow blocks:
- I see yellow horizontal blocks connecting the red blocks (likely blocks 9, 10, 13, or 14)

Let me determine the exact blocks and their positions:

The H-shaped structure appears to consist of:
- 2 blocks of index 1 (top-left and bottom-left)
- 2 blocks of index 2 (top-right and bottom-right)
- 3 yellow blocks connecting them (appears to be blocks 9, 10 or 13, 14)

For assembly order, I should start from the bottom up:
1. Place the bottom red blocks (indices 1 and 2)
2. Place the yellow connecting blocks
3. Place the top red blocks (indices 1 and 2)

content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Structure Description
The target structure is an H-shaped construction made of red and yellow building blocks. It consists of:
- 8 red blocks with arch/semicircular cutouts (4 on each side)
- 3 yellow rectangular blocks forming the horizontal connecting piece

The structure has 2 layers:
1. Bottom layer - 4 red arch blocks arranged in pairs, forming the vertical posts of the H
2. Middle layer - 3 yellow rectangular blocks forming the horizontal connecting bar
3. Top layer - 4 red arch blocks arranged in pairs, mirroring the bottom layer

## Spatial Relationships
- The red blocks are arranged in 4 vertical columns (2 on each side)
- Each column contains 2 red blocks stacked vertically
- The yellow horizontal bar connects the two sides in the middle
- The structure has a symmetrical design, resembling the letter H

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on the target image, I need the following blocks:

- Red arch blocks:
  - Block index 1 (used for top-left and bottom-left positions)
  - Block index 2 (used for top-right and bottom-right positions)
  - Block index 3 (used for top-left and bottom-left inner positions)
  - Block index 4 (used for top-right and bottom-right inner positions)

- Yellow rectangular blocks:
  - Block index 9 (used for the left section of the horizontal bar)
  - Block index 10 (used for the right section of the horizontal bar)
  - Block index 13 (used for the center section of the horizontal bar)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 2
    Step3: Move block with index 3
    Step4: Move block with index 4
    Step5: Move block with index 9
    Step6: Move block with index 13
    Step7: Move block with index 10
    Step8: Move block with index 1
    Step9: Move block with index 2
    Step10: Move block with index 3
    Step11: Move block with index 4
}
```
